per_frame_1=vol = pow(bass+mid+treb,2);
per_frame_2=basssum = vol;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=stickybit = time%2;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=//avg vol
per_frame_7=//buffer 1
per_frame_8=volAvg = volAvg + vol*equal(stickybit,1);
per_frame_9=//number of samples 1 or framerate
per_frame_10=sample1 = sample1 + equal(stickybit,1);
per_frame_11=//buffer 2
per_frame_12=volAvg2 = volAvg2 + vol*equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_13=//number of samples 2
per_frame_14=sample2 = sample2 + equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=//transision
per_frame_17=edge = bnot(equal(bit2,stickybit));
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=volAvg = volAvg - volAvg*edge*stickybit;
per_frame_20=volAvg2 = volAvg2 - volAvg2*edge*equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=sample1 = sample1  - sample1*edge*stickybit;
per_frame_23=sample2 = sample2  - sample2*edge*equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=//test vol against avg buffer lvl
per_frame_26=diff = if(equal(stickybit,1), (basssum/(volAvg2/sample2)) , 0);
per_frame_27=diff = if(equal(stickybit,0), (basssum/(volAvg/sample1)), diff);
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=bit2 = time%2;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=diff = diff*0.5;
per_frame_33=//diff = if(above(diff,6),6,diff);
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=monitor = above(diff,5);
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=diffhigh = equal(diff,6);
per_frame_38=
per_frame_39=q1 = diff;
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=difftime = difftime + diff*0.03;
per_frame_42=q2 = difftime;
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=//fix a strange error
per_frame_45=difftime = if(above(difftime,2000),0, difftime);
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=ob_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(difftime*3);
per_frame_48=ob_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(difftime*4);
per_frame_49=ob_b = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(difftime*5);
per_frame_50=
per_frame_51=ib_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(difftime*5);
per_frame_52=ib_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(difftime*4.1);
per_frame_53=ib_b = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(difftime*3);
per_frame_54=
per_frame_55=
per_frame_56=//rottating ceneter
per_frame_57=state = state + above(bass_att,1.3);
per_frame_58=state = if(above(state,1),0 , state);
per_frame_59=
per_frame_60=//need to init
per_frame_61=xs = if(below(xs, 1),5 ,xs);
per_frame_62=ys = if(below(xs, 1),5 ,ys);
per_frame_63=
per_frame_64=xs = xs + equal(state,0)*cos(basstime*1.2)*diff
per_frame_65=+ equal(state,1)*sin(basstime*1.5 + 1)*diff;
per_frame_66=
per_frame_67=ys = xs + equal(state,0)*cos(basstime*1.45 + 0.3)*diff
per_frame_68=+ equal(state,1)*sin(basstime*1.05)*diff;
per_frame_69=
per_frame_70=//project and publish
per_frame_71=q3 = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(xs*0.1);
per_frame_72=q4 = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(ys*0.15);
per_frame_73=
per_frame_74=diffhighbefore = equal(diff,6);
per_pixel_1=zoom = 0.99;// + q1*pow(rad,rad+y)*0.1;
per_pixel_2=rot = (rad-q1)*q1*0.05 - 0.05;
per_pixel_3=cx = q3;
per_pixel_4=cy = q4;
